code:
def rabin_karp(text, pattern):
    prime = 101
    pattern_hash = 0
    text_hash = 0
    power = 1

    for i in range(len(pattern) - 1, -1, -1):
        pattern_hash += (ord(pattern[i]) * power) % prime
        text_hash += (ord(text[i]) * power) % prime
        power = (power * 100) % prime

    for i in range(len(pattern) - 1, len(text)):
        text_hash = ((text_hash - (ord(text[i - len(pattern) + 1]) * power) % prime) * 100 + ord(text[i + 1])) % prime
        if text_hash == pattern_hash and text[i - len(pattern) + 1 : i + 1] == pattern:
            return i - len(pattern) + 1

    return -1
prompt: Rabin-Karp algorithm for pattern searching yaz.
